definitions.title: Pe.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[תְּקִָף]], of tree, Da 4:8, Da 4:17; 2 ms. [[תְּקֵמְתְּ]] Da 4:19, of king; 3 fs. [[תְִּקַפַת]] Da 5:20 fig. grow arrogant, of spirit of man.

definitions.title: Pa.
definitions.body: make strong, stringent: Inf. [[לְתַקָּפָה]] Da 6:8 acc. of interdict.
